Title: Authorizes the assessor of the town of Ramapo to accept an application for a real property tax exemption from Lev Teen Center
Summary: Authorizes the assessor of the town of Ramapo, county of Rockland, to accept an application for a real property tax exemption from Lev Teen Center.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the assessor of the town of Ramapo, county of Rockland, to accept an application for a real property tax exemption from Lev Teen Center
